nape.geom.MatMN

type
class
metadata
:final
A general MxN dimensional matrix.

This object is not often used in Nape :)

Constructor

new(rows : Int, cols : Int)
parameters
rows The number of rows in matrix.
cols The number of columns in matrix.
returns
The constructed Matrix.
throws
# If rows or columns is negative or 0.
Construct a new Matrix.

Instance Variables

cols(accessor,null) : Int

The number of columns in the matrix.

rows(accessor,null) : Int

The number of rows in the matrix.

Instance Methods

mul(matrix : MatMN) : MatMN

parameters
matrix The matrix to multiple with.
returns
The result of the multiplication
throws
If matrix dimensions are not compatible.
Multiple this matrix with another.

This operation is only valid if the number of columns in this matrix, is equal to the number of rows in the input matrix.
The result of the multiplication is returned as a new matrix.

inline setx(row : Int, col : Int, x : Float) : Float

parameters
row The row of the matrix to set.
col The column of the matrix to set.
x The value to set at given (row,col) index.
returns
The value of matrix at given index after set. (Always equal to the x parameter)
throws
# If index is out of range.
Set element at index.

transpose() : MatMN

returns
The transposed matrix.
Transpose matrix, returning a new Matrix.

inline x(row : Int, col : Int) : Float

parameters
row The row of the matrix to access.
col the column of the matrix to access.
returns
The element at given (row,col) index.
throws
# If access is out of range.
Access element at index.
